title: Mamzelle
description: New interactive edition available in the iTunes BookstoreYoung Jeanne Siousat travelled from her home in Louisiana to Washington, a long journey that finally brought her to Washington at the beginning of the War of 1812. There she soon became fast friends with President James Madison and his wife, the beloved Dolly Madison, and went on to meet the critical players in history and witness the key events surrounding the capture and burning of Washington and the White House.Recommended for readers 12 and above.Read nowhttp://www.beebliome.com
author: Gladys Malvern
